subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Toronto’s Troy Tulowitzki tied the game with a single, and a throwing error by Texas’ four-time Gold Glove third baseman, Adrian Beltre, allowed the winning run to score.
snippet: Toronto’s Troy Tulowitzki tied the game with a single, and a throwing error by Texas’ four-time Gold Glove third baseman, Adrian Beltre, allowed the winning run to score.
